@dev calculate the staking time bonus
@param lastStake blocknumber of LPs last stake/claim*

@notice function used at deployment to configure the connected binary options contract
@param options_ the address of the binary options contract

@dev transfer ownership of this contract
@param g_ the new governance address

constructor.details: init the contract (dont forget to also configure setupBinaryOptions afterwards, and deposit tokens)

deposit(uint256,uint256).details: deposit tokens into the utilization rewards

params.other: the BIOP tokens to transfer into this contract from the multisig for trader/settler rewards
params.staker: the BIOP tokens to transfer into this contract from multisig for staker rewards

distributeClaim(uint256,uint256,address).details: called by the binary options contract to claim Reward for user

params.amountOther: the amount in BIOP to transfer to this user for trading/settling
params.amountStaker: the amount in BIOP to transfer to this user for staking
params.claimant: the address who triggered the function higher up and should receive the claim*

getLPStakingBonus(uint256,uint256,uint25.details: called by the binary options contract to claim Reward for user

params.lastInterchange: the total interchange the last time the LP staked/claimed
params.totalInterchange: amount interchanged since LPs last claim
params.totalStaked: the total amount staked by all LPs*

params.completion: false for an open position, true for exercise expire*

params.options_: the address of the binary options contract

updateDailyMax(uint256).details: deposit tokens into the utilization rewards

params.nw: the BIOP tokens to transfer into this contract from multisig

updatePricePoint(uint256).details: deposit tokens into the utilization rewards

params.newP: the BIOP tokens to transfer into this contract from multisig

withdraw().details: emergency withdraw function to recover funds if theres a error in the rewards contract

setupBinaryOptions(address).notice: function used at deployment to configure the connected binary options contract
